Detailed Description

Exposes methods to access miscellaneous functionality.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktTools::ExtractIcon ( [in] BSTR  executablePath,
[in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] IPicture **  ppIcon 
)

Extract an icon from the given executable.

Parameters
[in]executablePathExecutable or resource DLL filename.
[in]indexZero-based icon index.
[out]ppIconA pointer to receive the extracted icon object.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if icon index is invalid.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktTools::GetFileNameFromHandle ( [in] my_ssize_t  handle,
[in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[out, retval] BSTR *  pVal 
)

Retrieves the name of a handle object from a specified process.

Parameters
[in]handleThe handle to query.
[in]procOrIdVariant specifying process to query. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
[out]pFileNamePointer to string to receive the filename.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if VARIANT does not contain a supported type; or handle parameter is invalid.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer is insufficient.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktTools::LocateFunctionSymbolInPdb ( [in] BSTR  fileName,
[in] BSTR  functionName,
[in] BSTR  symbolServerPath,
[in] BSTR  localCachePath,
[out, retval] INktPdbFunctionSymbol **  ppSymbol 
)

Locate a function symbol in an image or PDB file.

Parameters
[in]fileNameExecutable, DLL Library or Program Database file (PDB) to use.
[in]functionNameFunction name to locate.
[in]symbolServerPathServer folder or URL where the symbols can be located.
[in]localCachePathPath to a local symbol cache.
[out]ppSymbolA pointer to receive the symbol, if found.
Remarks
To enable the Deviare engine to use debugging symbols, the following library files are required: symsrv.dll which can be obtained in the Debugging Tools for Windows package and msdiaXX.dll which is part of the DIA SDK, available in Microsoft Visual Studio installation folder, under DIA SDK/bin directory. The Recommended Debugging Tools for Windows version is 6.12.2633 or higher. Deviare was tested successfully with DIA SDK versions 9.0 (msdia90.dll), 10.0 (msdia100.dll) and 11.0 (msdia110.dll),and it should work with newer releases.
The required debugging DLLs must be copied in the directory where the Deviare COM DLLs reside.
For operating system and Microsoft-related products, you can use the standard "http://msdl.microsoft.com/download/symbols" online URL to download the required symbols.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_INVALIDARG if functionName or fileName are invalid strings.
E_OUTOFMEMORY
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if symbol cannot be found.
E_FAIL on general error.
